title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\PersonName
name: PersonName
description:
Resource that represents the name of a person.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.PersonName

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.formatted_name
params.description: A string represents a person's full name. For example, "Dr. John Smith". Number of characters allowed is 100.

params.name: data.structured_name
params.description: A person's name in a structured way (last name, first name, suffix, and so on.)

params.name: data.preferred_name
params.description: Preferred name for the person. This field is ignored if [structured_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.PersonName.structured_name] is provided. Number of characters allowed is 100.
